title: Returning player looking to get back into the game
body:
I've been back for a little over a week now, trying to get used to all the new champs and items, etc, after leaving the game early in season 4.

now im looking to play with some people more regularly on comms either in team ranked or normal games, or maybe the occasional aram.

I haven't done my ranked placements yet, but going by how my games have been thus far, i would guesstimate i'm high silver - low gold, of course i'm aiming to be much higher than that (im super competitive like that)

before i left i was a mid laner main, but im more than happy to switch to another role if people need me to, since im relearning the game for the most part anyway.

playing at the moment pretty much every day as soon as i wake up (yeah im another no lifer) so i can fit in with whatever time people will be on.

Add me in game for some games or for any other questions :)
Zami

EDIT: i still own every champ, so i can play whatever, and swap as i need to.

replies.body:
I am yet to do my rank placement some day...

I am really looking to team up... but saying i am good at all... just to brave up

IGN: canc
hey, just added you. IGN: linkmoonshadow
